医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
P-茎核糖体被确定为癌症免疫逃避的关键调节因子研究揭示了 P 茎核糖体如何调节细胞因子反应，从而驱动多种癌症类型的肿瘤的免疫逃避。它为影响免疫治疗成功的翻译后机制提供了新的见解。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241023/P-stalk-ribosomes-identified-as-key-regulators-of-immune-evasion-in-cancer.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241023/P-stalk-ribosomes-identified-as-key-regulators-of-immune-evasion-in-cancer.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=abdcccac-c19e-408c-a09c-b94192017a85 Wed, 23 Oct 2024 01:03:00 -0400 P-stalk ribosomes identified as key regulators of immune evasion in cancer
水中砷与心脏病风险增加有关根据哥伦比亚大学梅尔曼公共卫生学院的一项新研究，即使暴露水平低于联邦监管限值（10微克/升），长期接触水中的砷也可能会增加心血管疾病，尤其是心脏病的风险。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241023/Arsenic-in-water-linked-to-increased-heart-disease-risk.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241023/Arsenic-in-water-linked-to-increased-heart-disease-risk.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8d38a060-362b-4d77-8f42-3274089ca946 Wed, 23 Oct 2024 01:01:41 -0400 Arsenic in water linked to increased heart disease risk
母亲的压力和抑郁会改变婴儿的 DNA，并可能产生终生影响怀孕和产后母亲的压力和抑郁与婴儿 DNA 甲基化的变化有关，可能影响他们的发育和长期健康。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241023/Maternal-stress-and-depression-alter-infant-DNA-with-潜在-lifelong-impact.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241023/Maternal-stress-and-depression-alter-infant-DNA-with-潜在-lifelong-impact.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d532abaa-c804-4e42-838b-dd4dac830541 Wed, 23 Oct 2024 00:42:00 -0400 Maternal stress and depression alter infant DNA, with potential lifelong impact
气候变化导致全球火灾相关死亡率急剧上升气候变化导致全球与火灾相关的死亡人数急剧上升，由于火灾引起的 PM2.5 排放量增加，死亡率从 20 世纪 60 年代到 2010 年代增加了一倍多。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241023/Climate-change-drives-sharp-rise-in-fire-lated-mortality-worldwide.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241023/Climate-change-drives-sharp-rise-in-fire-lated-mortality-worldwide.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=34a8f859-63d9-4dfa-9ead-c09488291281 Wed, 23 Oct 2024 00:16:00 -0400 Climate change drives sharp rise in fire-related mortality worldwide
可穿戴传感器和机器学习可以预测工人的疲劳程度，以提高安全性和生产力研究人员使用多模式可穿戴传感器和机器学习来跟踪制造工人的实时疲劳情况，揭示对个人疲劳模式和潜在的人体工程学改进的重要见解。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241022/Wearable-sensors-and-machine-learning-predict-worker-fatigue-to-improve-safety-and-productivity.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241022/Wearable-sensors-and-machine-learning-predict-worker-fatigue-to-improve-safety-and-productivity.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=09bdfb77-04c2-41ab-a95e-fd6f75c84935 Tue, 22 Oct 2024 23:55:00 -0400 Wearable sensors and machine learning predict worker fatigue to improve safety and productivity
乌克兰研究人员开发了用于检测儿童自闭症和发育迟缓的数字工具乌克兰研究人员开发了一种新的数字工具，用于检测儿童自闭症和发育迟缓。她的研究发表在剑桥大学出版社期刊《剑桥棱镜：全球心理健康》上。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241022/Ukrainian-researcher-develops-digital-tool-for-detecting-autism-and-developmental-delay-in-kids.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241022/Ukrainian-researcher-develops-digital-tool-for-detecting-autism-and-developmental-delay-in-kids.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4cc77162-8225-4148-856e-0663af250968 Tue, 22 Oct 2024 23:01:00 -0400 Ukrainian researcher develops digital tool for detecting autism and developmental delay in kids
抗体药物偶联物的进步改变了癌症治疗抗体药物偶联物 (ADC) 已成为癌症治疗中一种有前途的方法，提供了一种将单克隆抗体的精确性与细胞毒性药物的效力结合在一起的“灵丹妙药”策略。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241022/Advancements-in-antibody-drug-conjugates-transform-cancer-therapy.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241022/Advancements-in-antibody-drug-conjugates-transform-cancer-therapy.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a017852d-f146-4437-842d-aae010714c19 Tue, 22 Oct 2024 22:57:00 -0400 Advancements in antibody-drug conjugates transform cancer therapy
UK-DTOP 工具有望改善肾移植受者的预后由国际肾脏医生开发的一种新的先进人工智能（AI）工具代表着在预测和潜在改善英国肾移植患者的结果方面向前迈出了重要一步。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241022/UK-DTOP-tool-promises-improved-outcomes-for-kidney-transplant-recipients.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241022/UK-DTOP-tool-promises-improved-outcomes-for-kidney-transplant-recipients.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3e27b4e0-37fa-497f-993f-b5c2c96256c3 Tue, 22 Oct 2024 22:54:00 -0400 UK-DTOP tool promises improved outcomes for kidney transplant recipients
坏血病可能会在经济紧张的情况下卷土重来医生在治疗一名中年男子后在《BMJ 病例报告》杂志上表示，随着生活成本危机和减肥（减肥）手术的增加，由维生素 C 缺乏引起的坏血病可能会重新出现。与条件。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241022/Scurvy-may-be-making-a-comeback-amid-economic-strain.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241022/Scurvy-may-be-making-a-comeback-amid-economic-strain.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9243d2dc-32b8-4198-b844-2a05f359affa Tue, 22 Oct 2024 22:48:33 -0400 Scurvy may be making a comeback amid economic strain
研究表明精神分裂症与心源性猝死风险增加有关表明，在没有既往患有心脏病的情况下，精神分裂症患者因心血管原因意外死亡的终生风险（称为心源性猝死）比一般人群高 4 倍以上丹麦研究在线发表在《Heart》杂志上。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241022/Study-links-schizophrenia-to-increased-risk-of-sudden-cardiac-death.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241022/Study-links-schizophrenia-to-increased-risk-of-sudden-cardiac-death.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d9768b69-9d4f-4a30-aaa2-e50edfaa69e8 Tue, 22 Oct 2024 22:45:02 -0400 Study links schizophrenia to increased risk of sudden cardiac death
